description: A company make both liquid and foam hand sanitizer. Liquid hand sanitizer requires 40 units of water and 50 units of alcohol. Foam hand sanitizer requires 60 units of water and 40 units of alcohol. The company has available 2000 units of water and 2100 units of alcohol. The number of foam hand sanitizers made must exceed the number of liquid hand sanitizers. In addition, at most 30 liquid hand sanitizers can be made. If each liquid hand sanitizer can clean 30 hands and each foam hand sanitizer can clean 20 hands, how many of each should the company make to maximize the number of hands that can be cleaned?

WaterPerLiquid.definition: Units of water required to produce one unit of liquid hand sanitizer

AlcoholPerLiquid.definition: Units of alcohol required to produce one unit of liquid hand sanitizer

WaterPerFoam.definition: Units of water required to produce one unit of foam hand sanitizer

AlcoholPerFoam.definition: Units of alcohol required to produce one unit of foam hand sanitizer

TotalWaterAvailable.definition: Total units of water available for production

TotalAlcoholAvailable.definition: Total units of alcohol available for production

MaxLiquidProduction.definition: Maximum number of liquid hand sanitizers that can be produced

HandsCleanedPerLiquid.definition: Number of hands cleaned by one unit of liquid hand sanitizer

HandsCleanedPerFoam.definition: Number of hands cleaned by one unit of foam hand sanitizer

objective.description: The goal is to maximize the number of hands that can be cleaned by producing liquid and foam hand sanitizers

constraints.description: The total units of water used for producing liquid and foam hand sanitizers must not exceed the total water available
The total units of alcohol used for producing liquid and foam hand sanitizers must not exceed the total alcohol available
The number of foam hand sanitizers produced must be greater than the number of liquid hand sanitizers produced
The number of liquid hand sanitizers produced must not exceed the maximum allowed production limit
The number of liquid hand sanitizers produced must be non-negative
The number of foam hand sanitizers produced must be non-negative

numLiquid.definition: Number of liquid hand sanitizers produced

numFoam.definition: Number of foam hand sanitizers produced
